description: Evaluation questions for metaffi - complex multi-language CMake project with hierarchical aggregators and plugin architecture

questions.name: project_name
questions.question: What is the CMake project name?

questions.name: project_version
questions.question: What is the project version?

questions.name: cmake_version
questions.question: What is the minimum CMake version required?

questions.name: testing_enabled
questions.question: Is enable_testing() called in this project? (Answer yes or no)

questions.name: jar_files_count
questions.question: How many .jar files are built by this project?

questions.name: exe_files_count
questions.question: How many .exe files are built?

questions.name: dll_files_count
questions.question: How many .dll files are built?

questions.name: tests_count
questions.question: How many tests are defined in total?

questions.name: aggregator_names
questions.question: What are the names of the 4 main sub-aggregator targets (defined with add_custom_target and depend on multiple components)? (Provide a list)

questions.name: commented_subdirectories
questions.question: What subdirectories are commented out in the root CMakeLists.txt? (Provide a list)

questions.name: cdts_test_sources
questions.question: What source files are used to build cdts_test.exe? (Provide a list, include primary test file)

questions.name: python_runtime_test_sources
questions.question: What source files are used to build python_runtime_test.exe? (Provide a list, include primary test file)

questions.name: xllr_external_packages
questions.question: What external packages does xllr.dll depend on? (Provide a list)

questions.name: metaffi_cli_external_packages
questions.question: What external packages does metaffi.exe depend on? (Provide a list)

questions.name: idl_extractor_external_packages
questions.question: What external JAR packages does openjdk_idl_extractor.jar depend on? (Provide a list)

questions.name: jni_dependent_components
questions.question: How many components depend on JNI?

questions.name: doctest_dependent_components
questions.question: How many components depend on doctest?

questions.name: python_unittest_framework
questions.question: What test framework is used for python3_api_unitest?

questions.name: python_compiler_language
questions.question: What programming language is metaffi.compiler.python311.dll written in?

questions.name: openjdk_java_components
questions.question: Which components in the openjdk aggregator are written in Java? (Provide a list, use component names without extensions)

questions.name: metaffi_api_dependency_chain
questions.question: What is the complete dependency chain from metaffi.api.jar to its deepest runtime dependency? (Provide the chain using arrow notation like 'A → B → C' with Windows artifact names, or describe it as 'A depends on B which depends on C')
expected_answer: metaffi.api depends on xllr.openjdk.bridge which depends on xllr.openjdk.jni.bridge which depends on xllr.openjdk

questions.name: parallel_buildable_components
questions.question: How many components can be built in parallel because they have zero inter-component dependencies?

questions.name: xllr_openjdk_failure_impact
questions.question: If xllr.openjdk.dll fails to build, which other components would also fail? (Provide a list, use Windows artifact names)

questions.name: parallel_build_xllr_analysis
questions.question: Can xllr.python311.dll and xllr.openjdk.dll be built in parallel? (Answer yes or no)

questions.name: python311_aggregator_dependencies
questions.question: Which components does the python311 aggregator directly depend on? (Provide a list, use Windows artifact names)

questions.name: openjdk_aggregator_dependencies
questions.question: Which components does the openjdk aggregator directly depend on? (Provide a list, use Windows artifact names)

questions.name: metaffi_top_aggregator_dependencies
questions.question: What components does the MetaFFI top-level aggregator directly depend on? (Provide a list - note that aggregators are also components)

questions.name: python311_plugin_components
questions.question: What are the three main plugin components for the python311 plugin? (Provide a list with Windows artifact names for runtime, IDL, and compiler)

questions.name: complete_plugin_languages
questions.question: Which language plugins have all three plugin types (runtime, idl, compiler)? (Provide a list)

questions.name: maximum_dependency_depth
questions.question: What is the maximum dependency depth in the project? (i.e., the longest chain from any component to its deepest dependency)
